title: Wood Font?
content:
Hey I'm looking to do some vinyl signs for a customer of mine and his logo was made using this font. I have a vector pdf however I need the font file so I can makee up some flyers. Any help identifying this font would be greatly appreciated, as the owner doesn't have the font anymore.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Untitled-1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013215909/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_56.jpg) | 30.19 KB |
author: gaugeprower

comments.content:
I believe we have a match.. it's called Hick Sticks over at Letterhead Fonts  
 [http://www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/hicksticks.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013215909/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/hicksticks.shtml "http://www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/hicksticks.shtml")

Kris Todd  
Graphic Designer  
 [www.kasinkris.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013215909/http:/www.kasinkris.com/ "www.kasinkris.com")
